definition: fifth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fifth in order/letter "E" or Roman "V" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/penta
archaic variant of 菽[shu1]/archaic variant of 叔[shu1]
a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to share the same interests (idiom)/to be closely related/to be in the same boat
the emperor relatives (idiom); person with powerful connections
good people are at peace with themselves, (but) there is no rest for the wicked
pinyin: jun1 zi5 tan3 dang4 dang4 , xiao3 ren2 chang2 qi1 qi1
containing_words.word: 君子坦蕩蕩，小人長戚戚

sentences.english: Jin Yunbo followed the telegraph signal Qin Hanjie came to the Qi mansion.
sentences.chinese: 晉雲波追隨着秦漢傑的電報機信號來到了戚公館。

sentences.english: Several thousand year agos, the woman should be a windy and rainy miserably and miserably troubled at heart graceful and restrained parties.
sentences.chinese: 數千年前，女人都應該是悽悽慘慘慼戚的婉約派。

definition: surname Yin/dynasty name at the end the Shang dynasty, after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system

first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
